title: Cindy Crawford's lookalike daughter, Kaia Gerber, covers British Vogue
text:
Cindy Crawford's 18-year-old daughter, Kaia Gerber, has walked runways for top designers around the globe.

She's also been featured in high-profile campaigns and covered some of the most prestigious fashion publications during her short, yet impressive, career.

The young model just added another highlight to her running list of projects, as she covers the October issue of British Vogue.

For the cover photo, shot by legendary fashion photographer Steven Meisel and styled by Joe McKenna, the model wears a Maison Valentino silk jumpsuit with a Valentino Garavani silk headscarf.

For the issue, Gerber opened up about her private life and how she considers herself an "old soul."

"When I'm working, I don't have the energy to even flirt with anyone. I'm sorry, I just can't," she told the outlet. "But I'm not losing hope in all love forever. ...I have backgammon at my house, and that's all a girl needs. When I'm home, I'm living the life of a 70-year-old woman."

Her mother also addresses nepotism-based critiques celebrity children often face while working in a similar industry.

"Even though it probably bothers her, we all realize that, yeah, Steven Meisel will see her [because of who she is]," Crawford told British Vogue on her daughter working with the famed photographer.

"But you and I both know that Meisel, or Chanel, or Vogue -- well, they might have her for an audition, but they're not booking her because she's my daughter," she added. "I mean, she's doing things I never did."

The October issue featuring Gerber's full interview is out Sept. 6.
